description: This file contains C source code implementing functions related to the CCSP Message Bus Interface for the XDNS module, including engagement and event callback functions, as well as a wait condition function and a health check stub.

methods.description: A stub function to wait until the message bus condition is ready, with parameters for bus handle and component identifiers.

methods.name: int ssp_XdnsMbi_GetHealth(void)
methods.description: A stub function returning -1, indicating a placeholder for health status check.
